passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct
passes.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

ancestry: html > body > div:nth-child(4) > section:nth-child(1) > header:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > div > h1:nth-child(2)
html > body > main:nth-child(5) > div:nth-child(2) > section > div > header:nth-child(1) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > main:nth-child(5) > div:nth-child(3) > section > div:nth-child(1) > header > div:nth-child(1) > h2
html > body > main:nth-child(5) > div:nth-child(5) > section > div > header:nth-child(1) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > main:nth-child(5) > div:nth-child(6) > section:nth-child(1) > div > div > header:nth-child(1) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > main:nth-child(5) > div:nth-child(7) > section > div > header:nth-child(1) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > main:nth-child(5) > div:nth-child(8) > section > div > h2:nth-child(1)
